text: Outwitting Dad is a 1914 American comedy film that features Oliver Hardy's first onscreen appearance. ==Cast== * Billy Bowers as Mr. Gross * Oliver Hardy as Reggie Kewp (credited as O.N. Hardy) * Raymond McKee as Bob Kewp * Frances Ne Moyer as Lena Gross ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Lubin Manufacturing Company films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:Films shot in Jacksonville, Florida Category:Comedy short films
title: Outwitting Dad
